__e: I don't know. But I'm not broke, and I don't have a family.
Still broke, still love a woman, still can't have her.
Yes. - RUSS: Look, when we were younger and broke and we couldn't afford to go on dates,
His kid was riding his bike, he got clipped by a car--
Barret was hit by a car that sped away and the people in that car never even stopped to see if my son was okay, and I do not believe that you could be that callous.
What if it was one of yours cut down by a plastic bullet?
